title: The Millionaire's Lover 1
description: Connor Dade is a millionaire who has reluctantly agreed to let his best friends sister Isabel work for him. However, he is angry when she shows up late on the first day and brings along a friend.Becky has recently lost her bookstore and blames it on Connor Dade. She jumps at the chance Isabel gives her to work for Connor and she thinks that by working for him she will be able to get her revenge.Only things don't go quite as Becky had planned. Now she needs to decide does she want love or revenge?For Love or For Revenge is an erotic romance novella. If you like your romance with spice and verve, then jump in. This novella is the first in the series.
author: Helen    Cooper
